breaks.title: Career Breaks & Independent Projects
breaks.description: Took a purposeful career break to:

infoBox.title: Spontaneous Application
infoBox.description: Leave job title and job description empty to create a spontaneous application cover letter that focuses on your interest in the company.

jobPosition.label: Job Position
jobPosition.helperText: Leave empty for a spontaneous application cover letter

companyDescription.label: Company Description
companyDescription.placeholder: Tell us about the company, its mission, values, products, or what interests you about working there...
companyDescription.helperText: Required. Help the AI understand what you know about the company

jobDescription.label: Job Description
jobDescription.placeholder: Paste the job description here or describe the role requirements...
jobDescription.helperText: Optional. Include specific requirements to tailor the cover letter

validation.companyDescriptionRequired: Company description is required to generate a personalized cover letter.
validation.companyDescriptionTooShort: Company description must be at least 10 characters long.
validation.companyDescriptionTooLong: Company description must be less than 2000 characters.
validation.jobPositionTooLong: Job position must be less than 100 characters.
validation.jobDescriptionTooLong: Job description must be less than 5000 characters.
validation.needAtLeastCompanyInfo: Please provide at least company information for the cover letter.

display.regenerateAriaLabel: Regenerate cover letter with same inputs

generating.subtitle: This may take a few moments

errors.generationFailed: Failed to generate cover letter. Please try again.
errors.apiError: Failed to generate cover letter. Please check your API key and selected model, then try again.
errors.authSuggestion: Check your API key in settings and ensure it's valid and active on OpenRouter.
errors.networkSuggestion: Check your internet connection and try again. The issue may be temporary.
errors.quotaSuggestion: You may have exceeded your usage limits. Try using a free model or check your OpenRouter account.
errors.aiSuggestion: The AI model may be temporarily unavailable. Try selecting a different model or wait a moment before retrying.
errors.generalSuggestion: Please try again in a moment. If the problem persists, check your settings or contact support.

actions.editInputsAriaLabel: Go back to edit cover letter inputs
actions.retryAriaLabel: Try generating the cover letter again
